tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Two months back my mother was diagnosed with Covid and she was in Goa while I was in Mumbai. I was in search of a doctor to support my mom for treatment where I came across with Dr Shrikanth who helped in this difficult situation. He not only provided medical support but also checked on my mom with proper follow ups. Surely his support was epic in this situation, he also helped us in post covid treatment. He is helpful and provide proper guidance. I am thankful to him for his valuable service and wish him great success ahead in his life.

Doctor is very kind, patient and understanding. He gives time to explain our concerns, hears everything calmly, suggests the best alternatives and medicines. He remembers the medical history and makes the patient feel confident and motivated. Personally, I had a great help. Thanks Doctor. I am so grateful for your services and guidance.

**** ***** *** ******** ** *** ** *** **** ******* **** **** ******* He took his time out to patiently answer all our questions. Honestly, we hardly find such doctors in today's times.
Thank you so much for the bottom of our hearts, doctor. You're a great human.

review: I have taken consultation for pain In my anus while passing stool.I am so surprised that doctor talked with me for almost "HALF HOUR" & answered my all the questions. Even answered to my silly questions which was very satisfying and obviously important to anyone to know his disease in depth, Which clears doubts from mind and promotes speedy recovery. He was not in rush or in hurry and was very patient while answering each query.100% Recommendation from my side.Thanks Dr. Shrikanth S.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Let me start first with a big “thanks” to doctor.
Now a days it’s difficult to find a doctor like Srikanth who himself follows up with patients, which he seems to be doing, and did in my case.

Very polite, likes to hear the problem first and then analyses the root cause before prescribing anything.

Next time, if required doctor you will be my first point of contact.

Mr cool doctor!! Does not make us panic especially me being covid +ve with lots of things in mind. Sridhar had answered calmly.  Never hurried and I must appreciate that he response to our query quickly. This kind of positivity makes a huge difference in our life and we take this lightly with care.

Thanks Doctor
